page.title: 08Attitudes
page.content: People in our area are worried about too many new houses being built,for instance,the one next to my friends house,it was built exactly 1.2 metres away from hers, with only the fence dividing the two properties.The house is so big that it completely blocks out all the light from the kitchen,also the builders are very noisy what with shouting,banging and loud radios.Now the area around my friends house is packed with new houses that there are six drive ways all coming out near Cheyney Cross. Up Church Farm Lane are two fields, the man who owns them is always trying to get planning permission on them,we are all concerned because the lane is only 2.7 metres wide,and the average car 1.9 metres wide,and quite often there are lorries,trucks and Range Rovers going up and down.
